hyperedges.text: Agriculture Pilot

entities.name: Agriculture pilot
entities.description: Initiates a pioneering solution for high-performance sustainable management of old vineyards.

entities.description: Collaborates with humans in managing vineyards.

entities.name: Mortality rate of the vineyards

hyperedges.text: Viticulture in Portugal faces labor shortage, particularly in Douro Demarcated Region. A solution for high-performance sustainable management of old, terraced vineyards of Quinta do Crasto is expected using advanced trustworthy digital technologies.

entities.name: Viticulture
entities.description: Cultivation and harvesting of grapes for winemaking.

entities.name: Portugal
entities.description: A country in southwestern Europe.

entities.name: Douro Demarcated Region
entities.description: The oldest demarcated wine region in the world.

entities.name: Quinta do Crasto
entities.description: An old, terraced vineyard.

entities.name: Advanced trustworthy digital technologies
entities.description: Technologies that are reliable and secure for use in managing vineyards.

hyperedges.text: AI-powered cargo drone will assist with grape transport in steep-slope vineyards to improve efficiency, reduce physical strain, and optimize harvest operations.

entities.name: AI
entities.description: Artificial intelligence.

entities.name: Cargo drone
entities.description: An unmanned aerial vehicle designed for transporting goods.

entities.name: Steep-slope vineyards
entities.description: Vineyards located on steep slopes.

entities.name: Grape transport
entities.description: Moving grapes from one location to another.

hyperedges.text: Transport of grapes in steep-slope vineyard during harvest season

entities.name: AI-powered cargo drone
entities.description: Assists with grape transport to reduce manual trips and alleviate physical strain.

entities.name: IoT sensors
entities.description: Tracks worker fatigue, repetitive movements, and sun exposure for optimized task distribution.

entities.name: AI system
entities.description: Dynamically adjusts transport task allocation based on worker fatigue data, drone dispatch, harvest rates, and terrain constraints.

entities.name: Vineyard management system
entities.description: Integrates fatigue and transport efficiency data for adjusting workload distribution as needed.

entities.name: Wearable sensor data
entities.description: Used to assess worker fatigue for informed task scheduling.

hyperedges.text: Transport of the grapes in a steep-slope vineyard during the harvest season

entities.name: Data collection and handling for AI/Robotics Services
entities.description: Wearable sensors track worker fatigue levels throughout the harvest and grape transport process.

entities.name: Long-Term Adaptation
entities.description: AI models and robotic systems can be updated periodically based on new data and user feedback.

entities.name: Digital Twin
entities.description: A Digital Twin of vineyard logistics integrates grape transport dynamics, worker activity, and environmental conditions.

entities.name: Context Awareness
entities.description: AI models can incorporate terrain conditions, weather data, and operational constraints.

entities.name: Sliding Work Sharing
entities.description: The system can dynamically balance transport tasks between drones and vineyard workers.

entities.name: worker fatigue monitoring
entities.description: AI-assisted task allocation based on worker fatigue monitoring.

entities.name: cargo drone for vineyard transport
entities.description: Cargo drone with sufficient payload capacity and tested flight stability in vineyard terrain.

hyperedges.text: **O3.2 Select and test cargo drone for vineyard transport [March 2025]**

entities.name: cargo drone
entities.description: A drone designed to carry goods.

entities.name: vineyard transport
entities.description: The process of moving goods in a vineyard using a cargo drone.

hyperedges.text: **O3.3 Develop Digital Twin prototype for transport logistics [June 2025]**

entities.name: Digital Twin
entities.description: A virtual replica of a physical entity used for simulation.

entities.name: transport logistics

hyperedges.text: **O3.4 Implement AI-driven context awareness and Sliding Work Sharing [June 2025]**

entities.name: AI
entities.description: Artificial Intelligence.

entities.name: context awareness
entities.description: The ability of the AI to factor in environmental conditions for adaptive drone transport planning.

entities.name: Sliding Work Sharing
entities.description: A system where AI assists but workers review and refine transport task assignments.

hyperedges.text: The Agriculture Pilot focuses on three main use cases: UC-AGR-1, UC-AGR-2, and UC-AGR-3.

entities.name: Agriculture Pilot
entities.description: An initiative that introduces AI and robotics into vineyard workflows.

entities.name: UC-AGR-1
entities.description: Identification of grape varieties using image-based AI.

entities.name: UC-AGR-2
entities.description: Monitoring of vineyard conditions through UAVs and environmental sensors.

entities.name: UC-AGR-3
entities.description: Support for grape transport and fatigue-aware task distribution during harvest.

entities.name: Preliminary data

entities.name: Example

entities.name: 38°C

entities.name: 140 BPM

entities.name: 10 minutes

entities.description: different for each agent

entities.name: cost
entities.description: associated with each agent's actions

entities.name: maximum number of retries
entities.description: for agents before considered a failure

entities.name: minimum probability of succeeding
entities.description: defined by the user

entities.name: threshold to assign tasks to agents
entities.description: defined by the user

entities.name: PDDL
entities.description: used for encoding a planning problem

entities.name: deterministic plan
entities.description: generated using off-the-shelf PDDL planner solvers

entities.name: optimisation problem
entities.description: formulated to determine the most effective combination of task retries

entities.name: EvoChecker language
entities.description: comprising a .pm file and a .props file

entities.name: Pareto-optimal retry configurations
entities.description: per task

hyperedges.text: An adaptation process is triggered within the LTA component when one of four changes occurs: C1 - a task failure, C2 - a change in minimum success probability, C3 - a change in minimum assignment probability, or C4 - a change in an agent's probability to complete a task.

entities.name: LTA component
entities.description: A component that generates and adapts plans using PDDL planner solvers and EvoChecker language.

entities.name: adaptation trigger
entities.description: An event that initiates the adaptation process in the LTA component.

entities.name: C1
entities.description: A change representing a task failure.

entities.name: C2
entities.description: A change representing a change in minimum success probability.

entities.name: C3
entities.description: A change representing a change in minimum assignment probability.

entities.name: C4
entities.description: A change representing a change in an agent's probability to complete a task.

hyperedges.text: The LTA component generates a verified plan and different retry-augmented plans with their respective quality of service values.

entities.name: LTA component
entities.description: A component that generates and adapts plans using PDDL planner solvers and EvoChecker language.

entities.name: verified plan
entities.description: A plan generated by the LTA component that has been verified for correctness.

entities.name: retry-augmented plans
entities.description: Plans with retry configurations added to improve success probability and minimize costs.

entities.name: quality of service values
entities.description: Metrics used to evaluate the efficiency and effectiveness of generated plans.

hyperedges.text: The LTA component's output is a unified JSON file containing the plan as a sequence of actions, and a Pareto optimal list of solutions.

entities.name: LTA component
entities.description: A component that generates and adapts plans using PDDL planner solvers and EvoChecker language.

entities.name: output file
entities.description: The JSON output generated by the LTA component.

entities.name: plan
entities.description: A sequence of actions describing a plan, including assigned agents, locations, and tasks.

entities.name: Pareto optimal list of solutions
entities.description: A list containing multiple solutions that are Pareto optimal, each with a combination of retry configurations and associated quality metrics.

entities.name: _C1_
entities.description: task failure updated by digital twin AI4Work component

entities.name: _C2_
entities.description: change in minimum success probability updated by context-aware AI4Work component

entities.name: _C3_
entities.description: change in minimum assignment probability updated by context-aware AI4Work component

entities.name: _C4_
entities.description: change in an agent's probability to complete a task updated by digital twin AI4Work component

hyperedges.text: Mission plans target specific zones identified in Subsection 3.4.1 as having higher disease sensitivity due to vine variety composition and prior observations.
UAV paths revisit key areas in VMT: the slope near the access road, terraces between 120 and 140 meters of elevation, mixed-variety sectors.

entities.name: VMT

hyperedges.text: UAVs collect environmental data along predefined routes following topographic gradients.

entities.name: UAV
entities.description: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle.

hyperedges.text: Each mission is repeatable and spatially consistent.
Given the terraced structure and narrow rows in the vineyard, precise control over UAV positioning is required.

Environmental Operating Conditions

The defined flight conditions and constraints in this section also support the configuration of the Long-Term Adaptation (LTA) component described in Section 3.2.
